speaker: President.
english: President. – The next item is the debate on the report ( A6-0349/2007 ) by Mrs Jensen, on behalf of the Committee on Transport and Tourism, on Airport capacity and ground handling: towards a more efficient policy [ 2007/2092(INI) ].
original: President. – The next item is the debate on the report ( A6-0349/2007 ) by Mrs Jensen, on behalf of the Committee on Transport and Tourism, on Airport capacity and ground handling: towards a more efficient policy [ 2007/2092(INI) ].
